title: Historical Meaning Drift
description: Detects when the meaning of a word or term is being reinterpreted or updated in a way that diverges from its original historical context, effectively erasing the original usage or intent.
indicators: Modern definitions replacing historically documented meanings in discussions of past events
Reinterpretation of terms to fit contemporary narratives without acknowledging their original timeframe meanings
Evidence that language shifts are being used to alter or soften historical realities
